```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rio)
library(asbio)
library(stringr)
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
data <- read_csv('df2.csv')
```

```{r}
df <- data |> 
  select(c(18:24)) |>
  filter(!row_number() %in% c(1, 2,3,4))|>
  rename("Major"="Q8" , "only_life"="Q1_1", "abundant_life" ="Q1_2", "intelligent_life"="Q1_3", "treatment"="DefaultQuestionBlock_DO")|>
  mutate(treatment = str_replace(treatment, "Q2", "video")) |>
  mutate(treatment = str_replace(treatment, "Q3", "pic_NTS")) |>
    mutate(treatment = str_replace(treatment, "Q5", "pic_TS")) |>
  drop_na("treatment", "intelligent_life", "Major")|>
    mutate_at(c('only_life', 'abundant_life', "intelligent_life"), as.numeric)
 
df$treatment <- as.factor(df$treatment)

export(df, "df.csv")
```
